segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I see multiple hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing relentlessly, creating a real mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is streaming down the cabinets and covering the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in it, oblivious, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy, precariously balanced on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s reaching for cookies, totally focused on his sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Both situations are accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could give way at any second, leading to a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me anxious just observing it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I'm just an observer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a dangerous situation this has become, all unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR
